subtitle: Mussels served in little pastry cases.

method.text: In a large saucepan, saute the shallot in the oil for 1-2 min.
Add the mussels and cook for 3-5 min - making sure the pan has a well fitting lid, shake frequently. When cooked, drain well, reserving the mussel liquor.
Cut each sheet of pastry into 4 squares. Upturn individual ovenproof dishes like dariole moulds or ramekins. Brush the sheets of pastry with butter and place over the dishes.
Bake at 200°C for 6-8 min until golden brown. Remove from oven and leave to cool.

Meanwhile, take the cooked mussels from the shell. In a bowl, mix together the reserved mussel liquor, curry paste, saffron, cream and shallots. Pour into a saucepan to heat together. Season to taste.
Take off the heat and add the mussels. Stir well.
Carefully take the pastry cases out of the moulds and fill with the mussel mixture. Spoon any remaining sauce around the filled pastry cases.

title: Mussel boats
